default.description: Explore IoT lab programs and solutions with detailed explanations and code examples.

questions.question: Write a program using Arduino to control LED (One or more ON/OFF) or Blinking.
questions.title: Blinking LED

questions.question: Create a program that illuminates the green LED if the counter is less than 100, illuminates the yellow LED otherwise.
questions.title: LED Counter

questions.question: Create a program so that when the user enters 'b', the green light blinks, 'g' the green light is illuminated, 'y' the yellow light is illuminated, and 'r' the red light is illuminated.
questions.title: LED Control

questions.question: Write a program that asks the user for a number and outputs the number squared.
questions.title: Square Number

questions.question: Write a program to read the temperature sensor and send the values to the serial monitor on the computer.
questions.title: Temperature Sensor

questions.question: Write a program to show the temperature and display a graph of the recent measurements.
questions.title: Temperature Graph
